name: part_000
file: tmp_【#はあちゃま3D】はあちゃま、動きます。 [DsV-EJmbvr8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Introduction sequence featuring animations, credits, and graphics for Haachama's 3D live performance.
Haachama appears on stage and performs her song 'Yumemiru Sora e'.

subtitles.original: はあちゃまっちゃま～！
subtitles.english: Haachama-chama~!

subtitles.original: はあちゃまっちゃま～！赤井はあとよ！
subtitles.english: Haachama-chama~! It's Akai Haato!

subtitles.original: みんなも一緒に！
subtitles.english: Everyone, join in!

subtitles.original: 重ねた手は ぎゅっと離さずに
subtitles.english: Keep those joined hands tight, don't let go

subtitles.original: 行くよ 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Let's go, toward the sky we dream of

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: はあちゃまっちゃまー！
subtitles.english: Haachama-chama!

subtitles.original: 窓越しに見上げた とても小さな空
subtitles.english: Looking up through the window at the tiny sky

subtitles.original: ここで出会えたのは 数えきれない奇跡
subtitles.english: Meeting here was a series of countless miracles

subtitles.original: 繰り返し辿った 煌めきを繋いで
subtitles.english: Connecting the sparkles we've retraced over and over

subtitles.original: 星のような笑顔に満ちた
subtitles.english: Filled with smiles like stars

subtitles.original: Day by day みんなの声が力になる
subtitles.english: Day by day, everyone's voices become my strength

subtitles.original: Step by step ここでそれぞれ目指すもの
subtitles.english: Step by step, what each of us aims for here

subtitles.original: それぞれ描くもの それぞれ願った夢
subtitles.english: What each of us draws, the dreams each of us wished for

subtitles.original: 重ねた手は ぎゅっと離さずに
subtitles.english: Keep those joined hands tight, don't let go

subtitles.original: 一人じゃない 描き出す時めき
subtitles.english: I'm not alone, this excitement is starting to unfold

subtitles.original: 振り向く事なく まっすぐに
subtitles.english: Without looking back, straight ahead

subtitles.original: 行くよ 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Let's go, toward the sky we dream of

subtitles.original: 笑いあったことや 突き進む茨道
subtitles.english: The times we laughed together, the thorny paths we pushed through

subtitles.original: 思い出いっぱいなのに あっという間の日々
subtitles.english: So many memories, yet the days passed in a flash

subtitles.original: 上書きじゃなくて 名前つけて保存
subtitles.english: Instead of overwriting, I'll 'save as' with a name

subtitles.original: どれも全部 大切に生きていける
subtitles.english: I can go on living, treasuring every single one

subtitles.original: One for all みんなの為が力になる
subtitles.english: One for all, doing it for everyone becomes my strength

subtitles.original: Oh for all 共に賑やかすぎるくらい
subtitles.english: Oh for all, echoing together so vibrantly

subtitles.original: 笑顔がもっと止まらない 想いは膨らんでいく
subtitles.english: Smiles won't stop overflowing, our feelings keep growing

subtitles.original: 重ねたいま ぎゅっと噛み締めた
subtitles.english: Tightly savoring the present we've built together

subtitles.original: 一人じゃない 描き出す時めき
subtitles.english: I'm not alone, this excitement is starting to unfold

subtitles.original: 風を感じたら まっすぐに
subtitles.english: Feeling the wind, heading straight

subtitles.original: 行くよ 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Let's go, toward the sky we dream of

subtitles.original: 憧れて手を伸ばし 掴み取ったその光が
subtitles.english: Reaching out in longing, that light I finally grasped
